instructions.1: Brush pork chops with 1 tablespoon olive oil and sprinkle with Cajun seasoning, to taste. Grill or broil until pork is no longer pink.
instructions.2: Saute arugula in remaining 1/2 tablespoon olive oil in large nonstick skillet over medium heat 2 to 3 minutes or until just wilted. Season with salt, to taste.
instructions.3: Arrange arugula and pork chops on 2 large plates. Spoon Cran-Apple Salsa Dressing over pork, to taste. Refrigerate any remaining dressing.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the pork from Step 1 being used?
Is pork from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is arugula from Step 2 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is cajun seasoning from Step 1 still available in Step 3?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 2?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to use the pork in Step 3?
Can we brush (Step 1) and arrange (Step 3) at the same time?
